name: Smoky Sangrita
keywords: chipotle powder, orange juice, tomato, fall
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon chipotle powder, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Halve and core tomatoes, place cut-side up in a baking dish with a half-inch of water, dust with chipotle powder and roast 1 hour. Allow to cool.
Peel tomatoes, chop and mix in a blender with citrus juices. Season to taste with salt and, if desired, more chipotle. Chill.
